metadata.source: AGENT-R01 Industry Mapping Report + AGENT-R02 Financial Intelligence Report
metadata.confidence_methodology: 0.95-1.0: SEC verified | 0.90-0.94: DOE grants/major press | 0.85-0.89: State govt/trade press | 0.80-0.84: Company websites

milestones.event: IPO - first US automaker since Ford (1956)
